about_us: Personalized 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming provides precise rival detection1,2
Dual Noise Sensor Technology shuts out surrounding sounds / Ambient Sound Mode keeps you aware of important sounds
Soft headband cushion and synthetic leather ear pads for wearing comfort
Discord certified, clear communications via a flexible flip-up boom microphone with mute function
Game freely with wireless connectivity and low delay4
Up to 32 hours of continuous gameplay from a single charge5
Ergonomically designed controls for effortless operation
Personalize your experience through the INZONE Hub software2
Elevate your gaming experience with Sony’s INZONE Gaming Monitors

All features: All your favorite features in the box
Sound Quality
Wearing Comfort & Design
Microphone
Wireless & Usability

Hear them before they see you. With 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming and our proven hardware technology, you can detect where your opponents are and how far away. Even players hiding in shadow, or behind walls and obstacles, can’t stay hidden for long.

Our 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming, activated by the PC software INZONE Hub, features a newly developed virtualizer for gaming that reproduces spatial sound out of multi-channel audio signals as the game creators intended. Also, with the smartphone app 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer, you’ll get spatial sound optimized to your ear shape for truly personalized gameplay.1
Make your choice
Which suits you the most from the two colors – white or black? Whichever it is, you can get the same superb sound and great features for gaming, all with a color scheme that suits your personality.
Powerful bass frequencies
Fits snugly around your ears

Ducts on the housing of the INZONE H9 control and optimise low frequency sound reproduction for powerful bass that makes deep sounds like explosions and engines seem incredibly real. Hear the drama and intensity of your gaming world all around you.

Soft-fit leather ear pads are shaped to minimize pressure on your ears by optimizing contact with the side of your head. This highly stretchable earpad material is designed for comfort, stability and sound insulation.
Sustainability
Designed with the environment in mind

Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.
When you want to use the microphone, fold it down and adjust it so it’s close to your mouth. Highly flexible, it can be angled into any position.
At the end of your gaming session, the microphone can be muted and stored away in one easy operation simply by flipping it up.
During a 2.4GHz wireless connection using the supplied USB transceiver, a low delay algorithm reduces the latency from the game sound source to the sound output of the headset so you can resond fast.
Connect to a smartphone via Bluetooth® while connected to 2.4GHz wireless. You can enjoy smartphone calls and voice chats over Bluetooth while playing games using the USB wireless connection.
Need power in a hurry? A 10 minute quick charge gives you up to an hour of emergency game time.2
Running out of power? Charge your headset with the supplied long USB cable and carry on playing.
Adjust settings on your headset and see the settings reflected on screen in the PS5™ Control Center.
Change the volume balance between game sounds and voice chat from your INZONE H9.

Sharpen your senses and prepare for action. Our INZONE H9 gaming headset immerses you in the zone with spatial sound and noise cancelling for supercharged hearing and super sharp reflexes. Take performance beyond your best, detecting opponents before they see you.
Supercharged hearing, a gamechanger: See how our INZONE H9 noise cancelling wireless gaming headset with 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming helps you hear the most subtle of sounds and be the first to react during missions.
Experience 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming: Want to try our spatial sound on your favorite devices? Put your headphones on and immerse yourself. Feel precise expression of your opponent's position, movements, and more.
Advanced technology optimizes acoustics: We’ve designed our INZONE H9 headset to bring your game soundtrack to life. A symmetric acoustic structure, flexible enough to comfortably fit a variety of individual head shapes and sizes, enhances sound quality and spatial acoustic precision.
Every gaming sound, authentically reprod: Developed from our expertise in music headphones, the diaphragm of the INZONE H9 has a unique shape that allows it to reproduce extremely high frequency sounds with high compliance, as well as authentic low frequencies, for an immersive gaming experience.
Game for hours in comfort: We’ve created the INZONE H9 to be ultra comfortable so you can keep on playing through extended sessions. Designed to be secure and stable when worn, with minimal side pressure, this is a headset that’s ready to take into action for hours on end.
Just the game, no other sounds: From heaters and PC fans to construction work, INZONE H9 with multiple microphone noise canceling keeps out the sounds that disturb your performance. We’ve incorporated the same Dual Noise Sensor Technology used in our class-leading 1000X series headphones for invincible gaming.
Be immersed, be aware: Never miss important ambient sounds such as a phone call, doorbell or your partner speaking, while playing games. Ambient Sound Mode, as used on our music headphones, allows you to instantly switch between noise canceling and ambient sound by pressing a button on the headset.
Lead your team to victory with clear com: Coordinate missions clearly and decisively. A flexible flip-up boom microphone with mute function allows you to communicate effortlessly in-game with squad members.
Boom microphone, voice-focused: The high quality boom microphone, shaped so it can be brought closer to your mouth, ensures you’ll always be heard clearly. Because the microphone is bidirectional, your voice is picked up cleanly even during the most frenetic moments of a game.
Discord Certified: Rest assured your headset works well on the Discord voice, video and text communication service for seamless voice chat with friends while playing games online.
Game freely \u2013 no wires, low delay: Our INZONE H9 wireless gaming headset gives you the freedom to play without the stress of cables getting in the way. And thanks to low delay, you’ll never miss a beat with tight sound and picture synchronisation.
Power through a whole day of missions: Enjoy gaming throughout the day and even the night with up to 32 hours of continuous play from one single charge.
Perfect for PlayStation\u00ae5: INZONE H9 allows you to enjoy the immersive sound of PlayStation® 5‘s Tempest 3D AudioTech for gaming with greater spatial expression. Works seamlessly with PlayStation®5 consoles and special PS5™ features for enhanced performance.
Simple oval design for effortless operat: Our INZONE H9 features ergonomically designed control buttons and dials so you can easily change functions and adjust settings during a game.
Left side controls: On the left earcup are the main operation controls including the volume dial, Noise Canceling / Ambient Sound Mode button and mic mute. You also have the boom microphone and USB port with charging LED.
Right side controls: On the right earcup is the game / chat balance button, as well as power and Bluetooth buttons.
Personalize your gameplay: Our INZONE Hub PC software allows you to personalize your INZONE H9 experience by customizing a wide range of operations, including a variety of sound and hardware settings. Fine tune sound frequencies to your game for more clarity and immersion using the EQ function.
Sharpen your senses with INZONE gaming m: Our INZONE monitors elevate your gaming experience and help you perform to the very best of your ability.
Sustainability in mind: Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. The packaging material of the INZONE H9 is plastic-free and uses only recycled materials and non-woven cellulose,6 reflecting Sony’s commitment to the environment regarding our products and practices.
What\u2019s in the box: Open up the packaging of your INZONE H7 headset and you’ll find a USB-C charging cable (1.5m) and a USB transceiver included.
